alert.note: Alert for Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 5:43PM MDT until August 01 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Weld County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 543 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Briggsdale, or 29 miles northeast of Greeley, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Briggsdale around 555 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Keota. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
